name: Fyfill
description:
With Fyfill, you can connect your Spotify account with Figma to use album cover images as fills. You can also put artist names and album titles in text nodes.


You have two views. The first view is the search, there you can search for your favourite artists.

The second view shows you the albums in your library.


Why a mouse as logo?

Quite simply, Fyfill reads a bit like "Fievel " or "Feivel". And the only one I know with that name is the main character of "An American Tail".


The code is completely open source and I will never store any data from you.


Plugin: https://github.com/ph1p/fyfill

Server: https://github.com/ph1p/fyfill-server
